blocks.headline: TinaCMS: The Best CMS For MDX.
blocks.text: Configure TinaCMS to work with your MDX files and create a tailored UI for your components.

blocks.content:
## Elevate your MDX projects with TinaCMS

Unlock the full potential of your MDX files with a CMS that can be tailored to your components. Enhance your developer experience and create more dynamic content.

items.headline: Tailored CMS for MDX
items.text: Configure TinaCMS to seamlessly work with your MDX files.

items.headline: MDX Component UI
items.text: Register your MDX components with TinaCMS to create a UI that matches your needs.

items.headline: Dynamic Content
items.text: Create more dynamic and interactive content with the power of MDX and the flexibility of TinaCMS.

items.headline: Enhanced Developer Experience
items.text: Reduce the complexity of handling MDX files and improve your developer workflow with TinaCMS.

items.headline: Efficient Content Management
items.text: Manage your MDX-based content more efficiently with TinaCMS's user-friendly interface.

items.headline: Open Source Frontend
items.text: TinaCMS's frontend codebase is open-source, backed by a vibrant community and regular updates.

blocks.headline: Ready to transform your MDX projects?
